texts: {"template":"intro","texts":["Over Christmas and the New Year, most of the TfL network is open. However, today there are changes to services and planned works that may affect your journey."],"link":{"image":{}},"image":{},"wrapped":false}
There are changes and planned works on the following services today. All our other services are running normally.
See our Status updates map for Wednesday 26 December for Tube, Overground, TfL Rail, DLR and tram services.
{"template":"htag","level":"h3","value":"Tube"}
A reduced Sunday service is running today:

{"template":"bulletlist","items":["First trains will run from about 07:45","Services will be reduced from about 20:00","Last trains will be at weekday times","No District line service between Earl's Court and Kensington (Olympia)","No service on the Waterloo \u0026 City line"]}
{"template":"htag","level":"h3","value":"London Overground"}
There are no London Overground services today.
Follow @LDNOverground for news and service information.
{"template":"htag","level":"h3","value":"TfL Rail"}
There are no TfL Rail services today.
Follow @TfLRail for news and service information.
{"template":"htag","level":"h3","value":"DLR"}
A reduced service is running.
{"template":"bulletlist","items":["Trains are running every 10 minutes on all routes","There is no service between Bow Church and Stratford after 21:00","Please use local buses"]}
Follow @LondonDLR for news and service information.
{"template":"htag","level":"h3","value":"London Trams"}
A Sunday service is running today.
Follow @TramsLondon for news and service information.
{"template":"htag","level":"h3","value":"Buses"}
A Sunday service is running today:

{"template":"bulletlist","items":["Day routes start at normal Sunday times","24-hour routes start from about 06:00","See all today's planned bus changes on our \u003ca href=\"https://tfl.gov.uk/bus/status/?Input=\u0026lineIds=\u0026dateTypeSelect=Future date\u0026direction=\u0026startDate=2018-12-26T00%3a00%3a00\u0026endDate=2018-12-26T23%3a59%3a59\"\u003eBus status updates map for Wednesday 26 December\u003c/a\u003e ."]}
Follow @TfLBusAlerts for news and service information.
{"template":"htag","level":"h3","value":"Driving"}

{"template":"bulletlist","items":["There is a closure of the A127 for \u003ca href=\"/travel-information/improvements-and-projects/a127-ardleigh-green-bridge\"\u003ebridge work\u003c/a\u003e between Gallows Corner and Squirrels Heath/Ardleigh Green Road westbound only until 05:00","The Congestion Charge and T-Charge do not apply today","See our \u003ca href=\"http://tfl.gov.uk/traffic/status/?Input=\u0026lineIds=\u0026dateTypeSelect=Future date\u0026direction=\u0026startDate=2018-12-26T00%3a00%3a00\u0026endDate=2018-12-26T23%3a59%3a59\"\u003etraffic status updates map for 26 December\u003c/a\u003e "]}
Follow @TfLTrafficNews on Twitter.
{"template":"htag","level":"h3","value":"Emirates Air Line"}
Today the cable car is running 08:00-21:00.
See Status updates for Emirates Air Line on 26 December or follow @EmiratesAirLine on Twitter .
{"template":"htag","level":"h3","value":"Taxis \u0026 minicabs"}
For taxis (black cabs) there is an extra charge of £4 if you're travelling today. For private hire (including minicabs), there may be an extra charge - please check when you book.
{"template":"htag","level":"h3","value":"River"}
There are no Thames Clippers running today.
Follow  @TfLRiver for news and service information.
{"template":"htag","level":"h3","value":"National Rail"}
Check National Rail's Christmas page for information about service changes and planned works over Christmas and the New Year.
